Docs

https://docs.github.com/en/actions/managing-workflow-runs#enabling-debug-logging

Enabling debuging

 1 Setting -> Secrets -> add varaible  
 
 ACTIONS_RUNNER_DEBUG : true, ACTIONS_STEP_DEBUG : true

Github ClI

### for Mac 
Install:
brew install gh

Upgrade:
brew upgrade gh

gh commands
https://cli.github.com/manual/
